text: How would I package and sell a Django app?
Currently I am hosted a Django app I developed myself for my clients, but i am now starting to look at selling it to people for them to host themselves.
My question is this: How can i package up and sell a Django app, but also protect my code from pirating or theft.
Distributing a bunch of .py files doesn't sound like a good idea as the people i sell it too could just make copies of them and pass them on.
I think for the purpose of this problem it would be safe to assume that everyone who buys this would be running the same (LAMP) setup.
